content: **from the magazine ** candi jensen s designs are often inspired by the children in her neighbourhood bright colors and easy shaping are hallmarks of her work and this poncho is no exception worked in rounds in soft washable wool accented with two fluffy pom-poms the project is quick enough to complete in a weekend all the pint-sized princesses in your life will find the poncho the perfect accessory for their tiaras and gowns
